long_description: Tired of stinging sweat getting in your eyes? The Halo II headband's patented design makes burning eyes a thing of the past! Double-layer Dryline(R) fabric is durable, lightweight and designed to draw perspiration to headband surface for quick evaporation. Water-tight seal at brow line directs sweat and suncreen away from eyes preventing discomfort and temporary loss of vision! Trim one-size fit easily accomodates helmets and hats.
short_description: Tired of stinging sweat getting in your eyes? The Halo II headband's patented design makes burning eyes a thing of the past!
